The   Marketplace   team   in   DiDi   IBG   informs   decisions   across   DiDi  s   global   marketplace   efforts    formulating   long  term   business   development   strategies   and   accelerating   both   demand   and   supply   growth   worldwide    We   leverage   advanced   statistical   modeling    machine   learning    or   data   mining   techniques   in   a   scalable   manner   to   address   business   challenges    The   team   charter   spans   matching   optimization   and   incentive   allocation   to   balance   the   market   and   optimize   revenue   and   dynamic   trip   pricing   in   the   most   unique   labor   market  The   team   is   also   responsible   for   developing   meaningful   analytical   solutions   to   advise   decisions   across   multi  functional   teams  • 	 Choose   the   accurate   metrics   for   tracking   and   understanding   marketplace   and   strategies    and   develop   dashboards   that   provide   reliable   insights   and   visualization • 	 Mine   data   and   develop   ML   and   statistical   models   to   analyze   rider  driver   usage   behaviors   and   improve   current   marketplace   strategies • 	 Design   the   long  term   implications   of   actions   by   modeling   the   macro   ride  hailing   market   and   thinking   beyond   immediate   analysis • 	 Develop   dynamic   optimization   pricing   strategies   to   maximize   the   welfare   of   both   rider   and   driver   along   with   researching   academic   papers   and   studies • 	 Present   findings   to   senior   management   to   drive   business   and   marketing   decisions • 	 Collaborate   closely   with   operational   teams   to   understand   the   ins   and   outs   of   various   machine   learning   models    as   well   as   to   help   and   understand   their   performance   and   areas   of   improvement • 	 Work   closely   with   the   paid   marketing   teams   and   be   responsible   for DiDi   Technology   Inc     International   Business   GroupData   Analyst      Sr   Data   AnalystLocation    Shanghai  Beijing    ChinaJob   Description  The   Marketplace   team   in   DiDi   IBG   informs   decisions   across   DiDi  s   global   marketplace   efforts    formulating   long  term   business   development   strategies   and   accelerating   both   demand   and   supply   growth   worldwide    We   leverage   advanced   statistical   modeling    machine   learning    or   data   mining   techniques   in   a   scalable   manner   to   address   business   challenges  The   team   charter   spans   demand   and   supply   adjustment   and   matching   optimization    as   well   as   pricing   and   incentive   allocation   to   balance   the   market   and   optimize   the   business   profit   in   the   most   unique   labor   market    Responsibilities  ·               Construct   offline  online   monitoring   system   to   evaluate   the   effectiveness   of   implemented   strategies   and   to   diagnose   the   healthiness   of   the   business ·               Develop   the   mechanism   and   pipelines   to   monitor   Marketplace   performance   in   various   aspects ·           Construct   quantitative   prediction   models   of   Marketplace   performance   among   various   countries    which   serves   as   data   input   of   business   strategic   planning   and   resources   allocation ·           Work   on   improving   the   fundamental   data   infrastructure   of   the   team   through   maintaining   the   metrics   system Job   Description  The   Marketplace   team   in   DiDi   IBG   informs   decisions   across   DiDi  s   global   marketplace   efforts    formulating   long  term   business   development   strategies   and   accelerating   both   demand   and   supply   growth   worldwide    We   leverage   advanced   statistical   modeling    machine   learning    or   data   mining   techniques   in   a   scalable   manner   to   address   business   challenges    The   team   charter   spans   demand   and   supply   adjustment   and   matching   optimization    as   well   as   pricing   and   incentive   allocation   to   balance   the   market   and   optimize   the   business   profit   in   the   most   unique   labor   market    The   team   is   also   responsible   for   developing   meaningful   analytical   solutions   to   advise   decisions   across   multi  functional   teams  Responsibilities  Design   core   metrics   to   efficiently   reflect   both   static   and   dynamic   MP   state    and   develop   the   mechanism   and   pipelines   to   monitor   MP   status      performance   in   various   aspectsConstruct   offline   dashboards   to   evaluate   the   effectiveness   of   implemented   strategies   and   to   diagnose   the   healthiness   of   the   business    also   drive   the   iteration   of   reports   from   offline   to   online      automatic   productsCreate   and   refine   MP  level   decision  making   frameworks    and   propose   tangible   strategies   from   a   quantitative   perspectiveAlign   the   perception   of   MP   critical   frameworks   across   multi  functional   teams   Support   on   offline   simulation      estimation      status   evaluation      result   illustration   for   operation   and   product   teamsCollaborate   closely   with   operation   teams   to   understand   the   ins   and   outs   of   MP   strategies    as   well   as   to   help   and   understand   their   performance   and   areas   of   improvementQualifications       yr   working   experienceMaster  s   degree    preferably   in   Finance  Economics    Mathematics    Computer   Science    Data   Science    Engineering    Information   Systems    or   similar   disciplines   preferred3.5   GPA   minimum    3.7   GPA   or   higher   preferredProgramming   skills    e  g     Python    are   strongly   consideredExperienced   in   machine   learning   and   optimization   methodology   is   strongly   preferredKnowledge   of   databases   and   query   language    e  g     SQL    is   strongly   consideredSelf  motivation    intellectual   curiosity    outstanding   logic    analysis    and   problem  solving   skills   combined   with   an   ability   to   see   the   big   picture   while   remaining   detail  focused
